name: Toadland Free Test Demo
description:
Welcome to stupidly humorous game! (Not quite yet though.)

This game is called called Happy Birthday Simulator 20XX! Toadland! Currently in: FRICKIN' EARLY DEVELOPMENT

Controls: F8: Fullscreen and Windows switching. (Use fullscreen so game doesn't look like *Four Letter Word*.) Arrows: What do you think? Z: Talk/Engage Battle. Space: Attack/View Collected Items.

Credits:

Programming, art, music: Linky Bibee

Art: Bennett Van Duinen

Game: Game Maker: Studio

Music: Bosca Ceoil
